summary: A professor in the film department at a provincial university goes to Seoul to meet his senior, who works as a film critic, and stays in a northern Seoul village for three days.
cast: Joon-Sang Yoo|Sang-Jung Kim|Seon-mi Song|Bo-kyeong Kim|Jae-hong Ahn|Yoo-ram Bae|Hyeon-jin Baek|Jong-hak Baek|Hyun-Jung Go|Jeehyung Jung|Joobong Kee|Eui-sung Kim|Hyunjin Koo|Jonghak Paik|Sumin Park
title: Book chon bang hyang
